data.lyric:
[ti:Calling My Spirit (Explicit)]
[ar:Kodak Black]
[al:Dying To Live (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Calling My Spirit (Explicit) - Kodak Black
[00:00.67]I put my heart in my lyrics
[00:02.59]I gave it all I could give
[00:04.46]I made it hot at the crib
[00:06.50]I kept that fire at the crib
[00:08.56]Where you gon' go when you dead
[00:10.54]How I'ma know who for real
[00:12.54]I pour a four in a fifth
[00:14.56]You already know what it is
[00:16.57]I keep a pole in the whip
[00:17.98]'Cause a lot of these n***as out here envy me
[00:20.52]It ain't no ho in the clique
[00:21.93]None of my dawgs got f**kboy tendencies
[00:24.44]I don't even show no sympathy
[00:25.96]Sipping on hennessy it got me bending sideways
[00:30.26]Everything on me drippin'
[00:31.36]You n***as can't ride the wave
[00:34.17]N***a run around with the juice
[00:35.52]N***a come spill your drank
[00:37.99]I done earn my stripes now
[00:38.87]I'm tryna go get me some real rank
[00:40.88]Readin' through my third eye
[00:42.57]'Cause I got tunnel vision
[00:45.44]Had to open my mind then I opened a benz
[00:48.33]It's like you gotta sell your soul for them to pay attention
[00:52.35]F**k all that playing now
[00:53.70]I'm grown I put my heart in it
[00:56.46]I had to get down with
[00:57.78]That chrome to show them n***as I'm serious
[01:00.40]And it's like every song I'm on
[01:02.50]I be calling my spirits
[01:04.15]I put my hublot on rocks
[01:06.09]I put moschato on rocks
[01:08.08]Where I'm from we don't say opp
[01:10.09]Shoot at an OV
[01:10.99]Shoot at a cop
[01:12.07]Shoot at the police
[01:13.02]Shoot at your top
[01:14.09]I made a million off socks
[01:15.88]Free all my n***as who stuck in a box
[01:18.08]Locked up and watching the clock
[01:19.47]Locked up
[01:19.76]They fighting with locks
[01:21.10]Locked up
[01:21.26]They swinging they knifes
[01:22.57]I can't be living this life
[01:24.00]No more bacardi alright
[01:25.51]I don't want cardi so I'ma pour henny on ice
[01:27.90]My vision is vivid
[01:28.99]Told you I'm really a menace
[01:30.36]I'll show you I'm destined to get it
[01:32.01]I be outside with the glizzy
[01:33.44]Toting that fire
[01:34.33]I be trippin'
[01:34.96]I just might die how I'm livin'
[01:36.51]Ain't take a bath
[01:37.26]But I'm drippin'
[01:38.08]N***as ain't catching me slipping
[01:39.48]Ayy yeah
[01:40.40]I make you laugh when you with me
[01:42.13]Know that my swag is terrific
[01:43.50]Glee glee
[01:44.46]Ain't seen my dad in a minute
[01:45.98]But I can't be mad I got millions
[01:47.62]I just pulled up in a lemon
[01:49.18]Thuggin' so f**k your opinion
[01:50.53]Thuggin' so f**k how you feeling
[01:52.05]I'm calling my spirit
[01:52.87]Readin' through my third eye 'cause
[01:54.56]I got tunnel vision
[01:57.41]Had to open my mind
[01:58.42]Then I opened a benz
[02:00.64]It's like you gotta sell your soul for them to pay attention
[02:04.39]F**k all that playing now
[02:05.57]I'm grown I put my heart in it
[02:08.46]I had to get down with that chrome
[02:10.32]To show them n***as I'm serious
[02:12.46]And it's like every song I'm on
[02:14.44]I be calling my spirits
data.trans:
[ti:Calling My Spirit (Explicit)]
[ar:Kodak Black]
[al:Dying To Live (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.67]我倾尽心血写歌词
[00:02.59]我已经付出了一切
[00:04.46]我年少时就出名了
[00:06.50]我保持着年少时的狂热
[00:08.56]死后你会去哪里
[00:10.54]我如何能了解别人
[00:12.54]我往酒杯里加了料
[00:14.56]你知道那是什么
[00:16.57]我的车里始终藏着武器
[00:17.98]因为要防着嫉妒我的人
[00:20.52]我的帮派里不允许出现懦夫
[00:21.93]我的兄弟们也绝不是渣男
[00:24.44]我看不起这种人
[00:25.96]喝了点轩尼诗 我有点晕头转向了
[00:30.26]我的一切都那么耀眼
[00:31.36]你们都是不敢冒险的胆小鬼
[00:34.17]我是有实力的人
[00:35.52]总有人来给我捣乱
[00:37.99]我已经赢得了大家的尊重
[00:38.87]现在我要追求真正的地位
[00:40.88]审视我的内心
[00:42.57]我的眼光有点狭隘
[00:45.44]我得开拓思维 然后我开上了奔驰
[00:48.33]好像不出卖灵魂 他们不会在意你
[00:52.35]那些虚伪的人都滚一边去吧
[00:53.70]我是个成年人 我做事很认真的
[00:56.46]看来不和他们
[00:57.78]动家伙 他们不会明白我有多认真
[01:00.40]仿佛我的每一首歌
[01:02.50]都在审视自己的灵魂
[01:04.15]我的Hublot手表镶着钻石
[01:06.09]我的Moscato葡萄酒加了冰块
[01:08.08]在我的地盘 没有谁敢和我们作对
[01:10.09]看谁不爽就打谁
[01:10.99]警察算什么
[01:12.07]我们连警察都不放在眼里
[01:13.02]小心我一枪爆掉你的头
[01:14.09]我挣了这么多钱
[01:15.88]可以把牢里的兄弟都保出来
[01:18.08]被关起来就只能数着时间等死
[01:19.47]被关起来
[01:19.76]他们反抗着束缚
[01:21.10]被关起来
[01:21.26]他们挥舞着匕首
[01:22.57]这样的生活我受够了
[01:24.00]再也不喝Bacardi了
[01:25.51]我不想要Cardi 我想要Hennessy
[01:27.90]我可是看得很清楚的
[01:28.99]告诉过你 我可不是好对付的人
[01:30.36]我会让你明白 我得到的一切都是命中注定的
[01:32.01]我出门的时候随身带枪
[01:33.44]一言不合就亮出来
[01:34.33]我可是很狂暴的
[01:34.96]就算因此丧命也无所谓
[01:36.51]虽然没有洗澡
[01:37.26]但我身上的金银珠宝依然闪闪发亮
[01:38.08]我绝对不会让他们有机可乘
[01:39.48]//
[01:40.40]和我在一起我一定让你开开心心
[01:42.13]要知道 我是个走在潮流前线的人
[01:43.50]欢欢喜喜
[01:44.46]我爸从来不在我身边
[01:45.98]但我不恨他 毕竟我有很多钱了
[01:47.62]我还买得起车
[01:49.18]街头生活 老子不在乎你的看法
[01:50.53]街头生活 老子不在乎你的感受
[01:52.05]我在审视自己的灵魂
[01:52.87]审视我的内心
[01:54.56]我的眼光有点狭隘
[01:57.41]我得开拓思维
[01:58.42]然后我开上了奔驰
[02:00.64]好像不出卖灵魂 他们不会在意你
[02:04.39]那些虚伪的人都滚一边去吧
[02:05.57]我是个成年人 我做事很认真的
[02:08.46]看来不和他们动家伙
[02:10.32]他们不会明白我有多认真
[02:12.46]仿佛我的每一首歌
[02:14.44]都在审视自己的灵魂
